resources.string: The adventure game is a text based cave exploration game. To explore the cave you use the direction buttons. To interact with items as they appear use the grab and drop buttons. The goal of each level is to find the hidden gold and return it to the outside of the cave. Once this goal is completed the game cycles to a new level. The player can hold two items. Keys are used to open doors- make sure that you have the right key. A flashlight will cause the direction buttons to highlight directions that are open to move in green, directions blocked by a door in red, and directions that a player is unable to move are hidden on the respective button. The game is saved automatically and upon restarting the app the option to load a game will load the most recently saved game. If no game is saved, clicking load game will load a level 0 adventure. \n\n Have fun and enjoy the game!
